column1: Leaf mass per area (LMA), foliar nitrogen, phosphorus, major cations, δ^{15}N, and δ^{13}C for native overstory species from sites along the precipitation gradient in Hawai'i. All concentrations are percent dry weight, and values are means with SE in parentheses. Where no SE is reported, a single or composite sample was analyzed. Species names from @Wagner1990.
